product_name: Louis Garneau Multi Rx Bike Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed for spin class and dirt paths, the men's Louis Garneau Multi RX Bike Shoes have special outsoles with recessed SPD cleats that are made for walking. Synthetic leather-and-mesh uppers offer comfort and support. Semirigid rubber Ergo Grip outsoles. HRS-80 system provides heel support. Louis Garneau Multi RX Bike Shoes for men have rip-and-stick closure straps. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for spin class and dirt paths, the men's Louis Garneau Multi RX Bike Shoes have special outsoles with recessed SPD cleats that are made for walking.
